trans-unit.source: Represents a selectable item inside a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl" /> 內的可選取項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> 為 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>。

trans-unit.source: Its content property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> and its header property is <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 其內容的屬性是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>而且其標頭屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the TabControl Control
trans-unit.target: 自訂 TabControl 控制項

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>控制項，可使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>, see [TabControl Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tabcontrol-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>，請參閱[TabControl 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tabcontrol-styles-and-templates.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 設定視覺化屬性只會影響該屬性是否存在於這兩<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>控制項的預設範本，並且使用設定的。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> with <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> elements.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>與<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否已選取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" /> is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果已選取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem" />，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsParentMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Journal%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.BindsTwoWayByDefault%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsParentMeasure%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.Journal%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.IsSelected%2A> property to select a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem> programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.IsSelected%2A>屬性，以選取<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.IsSelected" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.IsSelected" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Provides data for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyEventArgs" /> 的資料。

trans-unit.source: Responds when an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey" /> for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl" /> is called.
trans-unit.target: 當呼叫 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl" /> 時會加以回應。

trans-unit.source: Old value of the content property.
trans-unit.target: 內容屬性的舊值。

trans-unit.source: New value of the content property.
trans-unit.target: 內容屬性的新值。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content" /> 屬性變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Old value of the content template property.
trans-unit.target: 內容樣板屬性的舊值。

trans-unit.source: New value of the content template property.
trans-unit.target: 內容樣板屬性的新值。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplate" /> 屬性變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Old value of the content template selector.
trans-unit.target: 內容樣板選取器的舊值。

trans-unit.source: New value of the content template selector.
trans-unit.target: 內容樣板選取器的新值。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.ContentTemplateSelector" /> 屬性變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" /> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 提供這個控制項適當的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.TabItemAutomationPeer" /> 實作，做為 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 自動化基礎結構的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因型別而異的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: Provides data for <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseButtonEventArgs" /> 的資料。

trans-unit.source: Responds to the <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 回應 <see cref="E:System.Windows.ContentElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Keyboard input event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 鍵盤輸入事件的引數。

trans-unit.source: Announces that the keyboard is focused on this element.
trans-unit.target: 宣告鍵盤的焦點落在這個項目上。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Selected" /> event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Selected" /> 事件的事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called to indicate that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.IsSelected" /> property has changed to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫以指示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.IsSelected" /> 屬性已變更為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Unselected" /> event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.Unselected" /> 事件的事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called to indicate that the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.IsSelected" /> property has changed to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫以指示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.IsSelected" /> 屬性已變更為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the tab strip placement.
trans-unit.target: 取得索引標籤區域的位置。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Dock" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Dock" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Dock.Top" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Dock.Top" />。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: It gets its value from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.TabStripPlacement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>.
trans-unit.target: 取得其值從<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl.TabStripPlacement%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性之父代<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to retrieve <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.TabStripPlacement%2A> information about a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何擷取<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.TabStripPlacement%2A>資訊<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.TabStripPlacement" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.TabItem.TabStripPlacement" /> 相依性屬性。
